mapper.select: SELECT study_id, stutime, zhuchiren, yingdao, shidao, shidaoname, weidaoname, content, bei, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_study LEFT JOIN department ON c_study.department_id = department.department_id ORDER BY stutime desc

SELECT study_id, stutime, zhuchiren, yingdao, shidao, shidaoname, weidaoname, content, bei, department.fatherdep, department.level, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_study LEFT JOIN department ON c_study.department_id = department.department_id where c_study.department_id=#{departmentId} ORDER BY stutime desc

SELECT study_id, stutime, zhuchiren, yingdao, shidao, shidaoname, weidaoname, content, department.fatherdep, department.level, bei, department.department_id, department.department_name FROM c_study LEFT JOIN department ON c_study.department_id = department.department_id WHERE study_id = #{studyId} ORDER BY stutime desc
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM c_study WHERE study_id IN
#{id}
mapper.sql: study_id, stutime, zhuchiren, yingdao, shidao, shidaoname, weidaoname, content, department_id, bei
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from c_study
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into c_study (study_id, stutime, zhuchiren, yingdao, shidao, shidaoname, weidaoname, content, department_id, bei) values (#{studyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{stutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{zhuchiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yingdao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shidao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bei,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update c_study
study_id = #{record.studyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
stutime = #{record.stutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zhuchiren = #{record.zhuchiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yingdao = #{record.yingdao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shidao = #{record.shidao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

bei = #{record.bei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update c_study set study_id = #{record.studyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, stutime = #{record.stutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zhuchiren = #{record.zhuchiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yingdao = #{record.yingdao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shidao = #{record.shidao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shidaoname = #{record.shidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weidaoname = #{record.weidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{record.content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{record.departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei = #{record.bei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update c_study
stutime = #{stutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
zhuchiren = #{zhuchiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
yingdao = #{yingdao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shidao = #{shidao,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shidaoname = #{shidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
weidaoname = #{weidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
bei = #{bei,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where study_id = #{studyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update c_study set stutime = #{stutime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, zhuchiren = #{zhuchiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yingdao = #{yingdao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shidao = #{shidao,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shidaoname = #{shidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weidaoname = #{weidaoname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, department_id = #{departmentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bei = #{bei,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where study_id = #{studyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
